text: @EmmaLGraney Remember this one #Canadians the next time @jkenney whines about what he’s not getting from Canada.  Remember he laid off teachers, TA’s, janitors and school bus drivers and stuck it on the nation’s account.  #abpoli #cdnpoli #CoronavirusPandemic
